text:
--- Page 1 Text ---
COURT FILING - MOTION TO SUPPRESS
Case No: 2024-CR-001234
Court: Superior Court of California
Judge: Hon. Patricia Williams
MOTION TO SUPPRESS EVIDENCE
TO THE HONORABLE COURT:
Defendant, through undersigned counsel, respectfully moves this Court 
for an order suppressing all evidence obtained as a result of the 
unlawful search and seizure conducted on March 15, 2024.
STATEMENT OF FACTS:
1. On March 15, 2024, defendant was stopped without reasonable suspicion
2. The search was conducted without a warrant or consent
3. The evidence obtained violates the Fourth Amendment
LEGAL ARGUMENT:
The search violated defendant's constitutional rights under the Fourth 
Amendment to the United States Constitution and Article I, Section 13 
of the California Constitution.
CONCLUSION:
For the foregoing reasons, defendant respectfully requests that this 
Court grant the motion to suppress all evidence obtained from the 
unlawful search.
Respectfully submitted,
_________________________
Attorney for Defendant
State Bar No. 123456
